desc_summary: 이 단순한 위젯 원하는 위치 알림을 넣어!
desc: BLACK FRIDAY SALE!! 33% OFF!Finally a proper way to display your notifications anywhere you like. Notification Station for KWGT places up to four notifications and/or a music player on a widget through the application KWGT (Kustom Widget). You must have KWGT Pro installed in order to use Notification Station for KWGT.WARNING: This is not an independent application. It is a theme for Kustom Widget ProADVERTENCIA: Esta no es una aplicacion independiente. Es un tema para Kustom Widget ProAVERTISSEMENT: Ce n'est pas une application independante. C'est un theme pour Kustom Widget ProATTENZIONE: Questo non e un programma indipendente. Si tratta di un tema per Kustom Widget ProFEATURES:Up to 4 Notifications displayed beautifully!6 themes to choose from, inspired by both Material design and iOSDisplays music + 2 notifications while songs are playingINSTALLATION:1. Download KWGT and KWGT Pro (not free)2. Download Notification Station for KWGT3. Place KWGT widget on homescreen and tap to open KWGT4. Open menu on top-left, press load preset5. Press the "installed" tab and select the preset you like6. Press the save icon7. DONE!If you would like a preview of what the widget experience is like, it is integrated with Notification Station for KLWP, a free alternative for KLWP that I offer, here.If you have any questions or comments please email me!

desc_summary: 모든 Android 기기에서 알림을 원활하게 수신합니다.
desc: The app that bridges your Android devices together!Featured on XDA, Android Police & app of the week on Spiegel!Bridge enables the possibility of receiving your notifications seamlessly across all your Android devices. Tired of missing your texts, calls or WhatsApp notifications when browsing on your tablet, using your smartwatch or any other device running Android?We've got you covered!With Bridge will you not only be able to read them, but do all the same Quick Actions as the original notification, such as Reply, Like, Delete and much more. And with Bridge’s smart two-way sync, dismissing a notification on one device - means dismissing it on all selected devices! Thats not all - you're clipboard is also shared between your devices for easy integration.Simply install the Bridge app on all the devices you want to ‘Bridge’ together, and select the devices you want to mirror notifications to and from.And with Smart Lock - logging in on your devices is a breeze.Doesn’t get easier than that! All your notifications can be end-to-end encrypted for additional security.List of features?? Mirror your notifications to other Android devices?? Reply, Like, Delete etc. directly from another device?? Clipboard sharing - You're clipboard is shared between your devices?? Two-way sync - all your devices interact with each other?? Whitelist - control which apps that can mirror notifications?? Encryption - all data between devices can be encrypted?? Private mode - Hide notification content on mirrored notification?? Battery charged notification - get notified when one of your devices is charged

desc_summary: 당신은 실수로 통지를 기각 적이 있습니까? 우리가 그것을 복원 할 수 있습니다, 걱정하지 마세요 ??
desc: Undo Notification simply allows you to restore any notification that is dismissed from your notification drawer.It is so simple to accidentally dismiss a notification when you receive too many of them. It should not be that difficult to undo it. So we made an app to let you undo your dismissed notification. Users with Android 7.0 (Nougat) and above: Install the app and add the undo action as a quick toggle. Users with Android 6.0: Install the app and open the app to undo when you need.Icon credits:Icon made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.comIcon made by Pixelbudha from www.flaticon.com

desc_summary: Bluetooth 지원 Car-Infotainment-System에서 App-Notifications보기
desc: This Application forwards Notifications from any app directly to your Car-Infotainment-System, to read it there.WhatsApp Messages can be directly associated with the contact, so you even can call the person or send a SMS message back (depending on the Infotainment function).   R E Q U I R E M E N T S- Car-Navigationsystem/Car-Radio which can be Bluetooth-Connected to your mobilephone and can display messages (Bluetooth-MAP Profile!)- This App needs to be your default SMS-AppAdditional Informations:If the forwarding stop working after some days, please check your energysaving-options and whitelist the app   C L O S I N G   W O R D SThe Application is based on the great QKSMS.For feedback or improvments just drop me a message.License: GPLv3

desc_summary: 놓친 / 읽지 않은 알림 (전화 / SMS / 기타)에 대한 정기 사운드 알림.
desc: Unfortunately Android doesn't have default integrated functionality to notify user periodically about missing calls/messages/other notifications via sound (only LED is blinking). This opensource tool allows to monitor notifications from any applications which are important for You (including missed calls, messangers, SMS, etc) and perform sound reminder periodically Just launch app, allow it to receive notification events, select reminder interval and important applications. That's it. If there are any unhandled notifications from thet selected apps in the statusbar, app will notify You periodically with the notification sound you choose.The battery is used only if there are missed notifications which requires periodical reminder. App wakes phone to perform sound notification and then sleep again.The app uses minimum set of required permissions.Android 4.0-4.2 support is experimental such as these OS versions doesn't have a 100% working method to monitor notification removal.XIAOMI users should enable application autostart explicitly in the security settingsHuawei users should disable battery automanagement for the Missed Notifications Reminder app: in the  Battery > App Launch -> Manage All Automatically - - >  uncheck MNR appSource code is available at github: https://github.com/httpdispatch/MissedNotificationsReminderBig thanks to all contributors:Sergiy Byelozyorov (https://github.com/rryk) for limit reminder repeats featurenaofum (https://github.com/naofum) for Japanese translationGerasim Panteleev for bulgarian translationHeimen Stoffels (https://github.com/Vistaus) for Dutch translation

app: Notes in Notification, Keeps Notes After Reboot
desc_summary: 즉시 알림 트레이에 메모를 추가합니다. 또한 과거의 메모를 볼 수 있습니다.
desc: A beautiful app to add notifications to the notification tray.Unique Features:* See past notes.* Add notification title as well as an optional description.* Notifications are not lost after rebooting/restarting the device.* See how much time you took to complete the task.* You have the option to stop notes from getting cleared.* Automatically adds a shortcut to add notes directly from the home screen.* Includes a widget to add notes directly from the home screen.* Mark notes as completed with the action button in the notification.* Add notes from the notification tray, using the action button on other notes.* Includes 8 color schemes, a mix of both light and dark.

app: Quick Volume Controls - Quick Volume notification
desc_summary: 볼륨 알림 전환 및 볼륨 조절 위젯으로 빠른 볼륨 조절
desc: Quick Volume Controls allows you to quickly change the volume levels without leaving running apps or games and even from your lock screen. Easy and fast access of volume control in notification bar using notification toggle. app also provide volume control widget and floating volume control for total volume control.If you have stuck volume button or your phone cover hides the volume rocker, or you want to avoid pressing the volume button hardware keys, Use Quick Volume Control app, its entirely touch-based smart volume control app.To make volume adjustments a bit easier and more intuitive, Quick Volume Control lets you raise or lower your volume level by simply swiping down the notification of your screen. Its Volume controls at Volume notification, so it's always one swipe away, and to sweeten the deal, the app have quick ringer modes, Silent, Normal and Vibrate.Quick Volume Controls app also provides Volume control Widget, so you can instantly change and control volume levels form your home screen and quickly adjust the current volume levels of alarm, media player, voice call, ringer and system notifications.Volume control widget allows you to quickly set the volume level of any channel(s) in one touch! Quickly access Ringer modes like Vibrate Ringer mode, Normal and Silent Ringer modes.In "Settings" you can choose dark-light theme for the app. and also you can change color of Volume notification bar and Volume control widget.ADDITIONAL SPECIAL FEATURES? Floating Volume Panel with default duration for it.? Dark and light theme for App, for Volume Notification bar and for Widget too.? Directly access System Volume settings.? Volume Notification with Ringer modes for quick and easy access to control volume settingINTERACTIVE WIDGETSQuick Volume Controls Widgets are very similar of your Volume Notification bar and provide the same functions.Install it from the market, then install manually the widget to the desired location of the desktop in standard way for your device:? Long touch on your home screen or click the menu button;? Choose "Add";? Click on "Widgets";? Choose the Quick Volume Control Widget.If Quick Volume Control Widget is not in the widgets list:? Make sure that it's installed into internal memory! Widgets do not work from SD card;? Restart your system.PERMISSIONSPlease note that the following permissions are required to use the app (the function/reasons are provided in brackets):? Do Not Disturb Permission(Android 7+ devices require this permission to change the volume level to 0 or increase it from 0)? System Overlay Permission(Floating Volume Control panel runs on top of any running apps and it require this permission)? Run at startup (restore settings after startup)NOTE: Starting from Android version 4.1.x (Jelly Bean) in the standard firmware channels "System", "Alert" and "Ringer" are tied. They can not be set separately. This is not the reason to blame the app. At the same time, in some versions of firmware (e.g. in Samsung), these channels are NOT tied. Therefore the App have the opportunity to display and to adjust them separately, if possible.Please visit www.yogeshdama.com for more details.If you like the app, don't forget rate 5 star ★★★★★ or review.for issues and suggestions please email us at bhanushali.neelam@gmail.com

desc_summary: 모든 알림 LED 플래시 경고 슈퍼 밝은.
desc: 플래시 라이트는 NAR 남자하겠다 통화, SMS 알림을 깜박입니다. 플래시 알림 이동 전화, SMS 및 알림에 플래시 경고에 ??대한 간단한 설치와 함께 제공됩니다. 플래시 알림 모든 플래시 경고의 요구에 대한 원 스톱 응용 프로그램입니다. 지금보십시오!연락처, 앱, 벨소리 모드, 시간 및 배터리 절약 및 조정 전등 점멸하여 손전등 알림 OGSA를하겠다 고급 설정이 구성 손전등 경고.플래시 알림 가장 다른 사람을 방해하지 않고 (병원, 학교, 사무실 등 조용한 지역에) 또는 밤 시간에 직장에서 NAR을 남용한다.플래시 라이트 경고는 앱의 모든 메시지, 전화, SMS, 마을, 연락처 및 알림을 알 수 있습니다. 그래서 당신은 밤이나 낮이나 특정 시간 동안 성가신 푸시 알림에 대한 걱정을 중지 할 수 있습니다.특징 :***** 전화에 플래시 알림, SMS 및 알림????????- 당신은 전화, SMS 및 알림을 밝은 LED 플래시 알림 NAR 받기***** 구성 플래시 알림시 연락처????????- SMS 전화 및하기 / 비활성화 플래시 알림 도시의 연락처를 사용앱 ***** 구성 플래시 알림????????- 활성화 / 알림 앱에서 플래시 알림을 사용하지 않도록 설정***** 벨소리 모드로 플래시 알림 구성????????- 활성화 / (소리) 모드를 사용하시면 플래시 알림을 사용하지 않도록 설정시간에 의해 ***** 구성 플래시 알림????????- 활성화 / 지속 시간에 의해 플래시 알림을 사용하지 않도록 설정배터리 절약에 의해 ***** 구성 플래시 알림????????- 안 플래시 알림 NAR 배터리가 부족합니다***** 구성 플래시 라이트 주파수???????- 깜박이는 손전등을 조정이 앱은 BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE을 (를) 사용합니다.가장 강력한, 밝은 빠른 LED 플래시 알림. 지금보십시오!

desc_summary: 쉽게 저장하고 모든 알림 역사를 통해 검색 할 수 있습니다.
desc: Features? Save and view all notification information? Search through notifications by app, title, or text? Filter notifications by time frame? Blacklist notifications from being saved? Export notification history to CSVRequirements? Android 4.4+? Notification access in Security settingsPermissions? WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Used to create CSV exportNOTE: Filters operate in real time, previous notifications will be kept when you create a filter. New notifications that satisfy the filter will be blocked while the filter is active.

app: Bottom Quick Settings - 알림 사용자 지정
desc_summary: Android 접근성 재정의.빠른 설정 및 알림에 간편하게 액세스
desc: Do you find the quick settings and notifications hard to reach with one hand at the top of your screen?Don't like shuffling your hand up each time to reach them?You no longer have to!Bottom Quick Settings provides a smooth, fast and native feeling Android styled quick setting and notification panel at the bottom of your screen, allowing you to toggle settings like WiFi, Bluetooth, Flash and many more, as well as adding shortcuts to apps and websites in the panel too!iOS has had the control center at the bottom of the screen for years.With Bottom Quick Settings, you can finally get the same ease of access and more! FeaturesNotifications- Control all notifications- Open, dismiss and interact with notifications- Manage notifications and hide persistent notifications- Full colour customisation- Dynamic notification coloursQuick Setting Panel- 40+ different settings to choose from- Add any app or URL as a shortcut in the panel- Change the layout of the panel tiles (number of rows and columns)- Change the screen brightness, ringtone and media volume with sliders- Add/remove sliders from the panel e.g. for screen brightness or volume- Android Q & Pie themedOther Customisation Options- Change the colours of the panel background and the quick setting icons- Add a background image to the panel- Select an app icon pack- Match the navigation bar colour to the footer colourGet extra features with Root / ADB- Ability to toggle secure system settings such as Mobile Data and Location. These settings can only be toggled with root or a one time ADB command, due to Android's security restrictionsBackup sharing- You can share your own backups and use backups created by others in this Telegram group: t.me/BottomQuickSettingsBackupSharingSome of the main quick settings:- WiFi- Mobile data- Bluetooth- Location- Rotate mode- Do not disturb- Airplane mode- Night mode- Sync- Torch / Flashlight- NFC- Music controls- WiFi hotspot- Screen timeout- Immersive mode- Caffeine (keep screen awake)- Invert colors- Battery saver- And over 20 more!Links- Promo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5XghIuvweE- Twitter: https://twitter.com/tombayleyapps- Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/Kcx0ChNj2j5R4B0UpYp4SQ- Support forum: https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-quick-settings-t3864903- FAQ: https://sites.google.com/view/bottomquicksettings/faqSome extra customisation options require an in-app purchase including: notifications, colours and additional quick settings

desc_summary: 앱이 상태 표시 줄을 납치시키지 말라
desc: Are you tired of long-clicking in a not desired notification to access the app settings to disallow it to show more notifications?Now with Notification Blocker you can choose which apps are allowed to post notifications on your device with only one click and even with the possibility to enable or disable the locking system at any time.This app is open source and you can watch it on https://github.com/RedInput/Notification-Blocker

desc_summary: 응용 프로그램은 모든 알림에 관한 것입니다. 그것은 CPU / GPU에 대한 실시간 데이터를 보여줍니다.
desc: Have you ever wondered what is your CPU or GPU doing now, how many memory is currently available and so on? Usually to do this you had to quit your app and switch to other one to see this data. But by the time of switching data is already irrelevant!With help of this app you can have all this data as permanent notification and you can access it in a single swipe.The app shows1. Name of app (or process) consuming most CPU cycles now*2. CPU utilization - total and per core3. CPU frequency - current, maximum and average4. CPU active core5. CPU temperature*6. Battery temperature7. Available memory8. GPU utilization*9. GPU frequency - current and maximum*AND ALL THAT SIMULTANEOUSLY AS NOTIFICATION!Application also show information about device's hardware.*If you are wondering how you could remove temporary the notification, you can expand it and you will see "remove" button. To enable it back again just start the app.Supports Android 8* DISCLAIMER: Some Mali's GPU are not supported. This is because of permission issues on Mali devices. Also because of permissions issues with some custom ROMs (like Linage OS) other options marked with * may not be supported as well. Sorry for this inconvenient. If there is someway to solve it, we will. Data shown in the application are for information. For accurate specification please refer to the manufacturer.If you wish other functionality in the app, feel free to ask in comments :)Thanks !Future versions with free access as now:1. Change log inside app (done)2. New feature: CPU/GPU name and speed index (done)3. Notification for high battery temperature (done)4. Internet meter5. HDD meter (if possible)6. New design (done)7. Root access in order to unlock all featuresFuture versions paid functionality:1. Custom arrangement of notification2. Donations (done)3. Usage history4. Dark & White themes (done)

desc_summary: 2018년에 가장 쿨한 개성화 알림 관리 앱.
desc: 잎 스마트 알림(Leaf Smart Notify), 2018년에 가장 쿨한 개성화 알림 관리 앱. 알림바를 관리하는 동시에 모든 알림 소식을 보존할 수 있고 알림 양식과 가로모드 알림 등 개성만점의 알림방식을 제공합니다.방해 알림 차단- 앱의 알림 소식을 신속히 분류하고 알림과 방해금지 모드의 개성화 설정을 제공해주고 알림의 방해를 효율적으로 차단합니다. 시간을 절약하고 공부와 근무 효율을 높입니다.이전 알림 보류: 아무런 중요한 알림도 놓치지 않도록 합니다. 일부 앱의 알림에 신경쓰시지 않은데도 가끔씩 중요한 내용이 있습니다. 이런 알림을 차단모드로 설정하고 시간 여유 있을 때 알림 기록을 한번 y어보면 시간을 절약하는 동시에 중요 정보를 놓치는 걱정까지 없애드립니다. 필요하면 알림 기록을 한꺼번에 삭제할 수 있습니다.개성화 알림 기능:가로 스크린 알림: 영상을 보거나 게임을 할 때 알림의 방해를 받지 않도록 합니다. 탄막 양식도 있거든요. 쿨하죠!방해금지 설정- 특별한 기간에 방해를 받지 않도록 합니다. 알림 차단하는 기간에 모든 알림(벨소리와 알림 진동 포함)은 알림바에 표시되지 않고 알림기록만 남습니다.알림의 상세 미리보기 모드- 한눈에 알림의 내용을 알 수 있도록 합니다. 읽는 효율을 높이는 동시에 시간 절약합니다.알림 보류-이미 보던 알림도 장기간으로 보류할 수 있고 보류 기간은 내 마음대로: 7일이나 15일, 30일, 아니면 영구 보존.쿨한 스킨/알림 양식--플로팅바 알림의 스킨 바꿀 수 있는 기능. 모든 알림이 쿨하게! 개성만점! 더 다양한 알림 양식을 체험해보세요.

desc_summary: Create notifications and intercept other apps' notifications in Tasker.
desc: 오토노티피케이션젤리빈 이상에서 지원하는 Tasker의 고급 대화형 알림입니다.***경고!! ***당신이 이것을 사용하기 위해선 Tasker가 설치되어있어야 합니다.오토노티피케이션은 Tasker의 플러그인으로 작동합니다.이점 주의해 주시고 이것으로 인해 부정적 평가를 주지 마세요.***부정적인 댓글을 남기시기 전에 제게 먼저 연락주세요. ***전 언제나 당신을 돕기위해 최선을 다할 것입니다.그리고, 당신의 연락처를 몰라서 연락할 수 없는 경우, 당신을 도울수가 없어요.오토노티피케이션을 사용해 당신은 다음과 같은 특성을 가진 Tasker의 알림을 만들 수 있습니다.-제목-본문(젤리빈 이상 8줄까지)-시계의 문자-작은 오른쪽 아래의 문자열-작은 오른쪽 아래 번호 (일부 장치의 문자열보다 좀 더 크게 렌더링 할 수 있습니다.)-서브 문자열(2차 통지)-다른 알림 수신에 반응(오토노티피케이션 프로필로 활용할수 있습니다.)-알림을 눌렀을때 반응(오토노티피케이션 프로필로 활용할수 있습니다.)-알림을 지웠을때 반은-바로 열 수 있는 URL-로컬이나 웹URL에 있는 아이콘 설정-ID설정(동일한 아이디를 가진 알림은 서로 겹치는 것입니다. 이것을 사용해 (배터리 레벨같은걸 표시하는 경우에) 당신은 항상 최신의 알람을 유지할 수 있습니다)-알림 우선순위-지울수 없는 알림-눌러서 알림 삭제-사용자 정의 소리-사용자 정의 LED-사용자 정의 진동(패턴을 생성하는건 Http://goo.gl/svMXG 를 참고하세요.)-큰 그림 (URL이나 로컬에 있는 이미지를 젤리빈 형식의 알림으로 띄울수 있어요)-최대 진행(진행바의 최대 값)-진행률 표시-불확정 진행 바-공유버튼-버튼 1, 2, 3 (버튼을 통해 Tasker가 반응할 수 있어요.)-라벨 1, 2, 3(버튼의 라벨)-아이콘 1, 2, 3(버튼의 아이콘)***라이트 버전의 제한***-제목과 텍스트는 5자로 제한됩니다.-LED 색은 빨강, 100ms으로 켜지거나 꺼짐-진동은 지원하지 않습니다.-사용자 정의 알림음은 지원하지 않습니다.-Tasker가 반응할수 있는 메세지는 2글자로 제한됩니다.어플 내 구매버튼을 통해 풀버전을 얻으세요.앞서 말씀드린 바와 같이, 당신은 joaomgcd명령시스템을 사용하여 Tasker가 반응하게 할 수 있습니다.여기서 이것들을 어떻게 응용하는지 확인하세요.http://goo.gl/PRQas대화형  알림에 대한 데모Http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=br050i8uGiYpocketables 에 대한 데모Http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8nboZy3kBBY오토노티피케이션을 사용하는 항목에 대한 팁Http://goo.gl/CmrRl기본적으로, "Test" 를 핸드폰에 복사하여 대화형 알림을 만들 수 있습니다.-Tasker에서 오토노티피케이션 액션을 만드세요.(new Task > Plugins > AutoNotification )-당신이 보내는 메세지에 반응할 수 있는 필드를 설정하려면"Copy =:=Test" 를 만드세요.-새 프로필을 만들고 오토노티피케이션 condition을 만드세요.(New Profile > Condition > Plugins > AutoNotification )-메세지 필터에 "Copy =:= " 를 쓰세요.이것은 "Copy =:= " 가 포함된 모든 메세지에 반응합니다.-해당 항목에 클립보드와 %ancomm 에 추가하는 작업을 추가합니다.' %ancomm ' 은 =:= 오른쪽의 문자로,  오토노티피케이션 프로필 작업에서 사용할 수 있는 변수 중 하나입니다.-완성입니다. 이제 'Test"가 핸드폰의 클립보드에 입력됩니다.***오토노티피케이션에서 사용하는 변수***- %anmessage 는 메세지의 모든 부분입니다.- %anpar1 ,  %anpar2 ,  %anpar3 ...은 =:= 왼쪽의 문자입니다.- %ancomm 은 =:= 오른쪽의 모든 문자입니다.이 명령시스템을 사용해서 사용자 정의 알림메세지를 통해 Tasker를 제어할 수 있습니다.이 명령시스템의 대부분은 Auto remote에도 존재합니다.따라서 Auto remote(Http://goo.gl/1npde)를 사용한다면, 당신은 원격으로 훨씬 더 많은 부분을 제어할 수 있습니다.***알림 차단은 안드로이드 4.3+ 에서 작동합니다***

desc_summary: 알림을받을 수있는 화면을 연결합니다.
desc: Liga a tela ao receber uma notificacao, assim voce pode ler ela na tela de bloqueio sem necessidade de apertar o botao de ligar do aparelho.Basta abrir o app, ativar o servico, dar permissao de acesso as notificacoes e entao selecionar os aplicativos que deseja que a tela ligue ao receber uma notificacao.Este aplicativo precisa de permissao de administrador do dispositivo(BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN):Esta permissao e necessaria pois em alguns dispositivos quando a tela esta bloqueada pode nao ser possivel ligar a tela ou entao desliga-la apos o tempo de timeout configurado.

desc_summary: 친한 친구, 장난 꾸러기에 대한 알림을 만듭니다. 원치 않는 상황을 피하십시오!
desc: Create fake notification in just 3 steps . You just have to  Input app name,  message & then select icon. There are seamless ways to use this app one important use is to " Get out from extreme unwanted situations by faking important notifications from relatives".  ??Features1. Create notification on the spot.2. Schedule Multiple notification 3. History of Notifications4. Re-send old notification5. Edit old notification 6. Set user icon - That is who sent the messageCreate notifications for apps listed below:1. Instagram2. Whatsapp3. Facebook4. Snapchat5. Musical.ly6. Hike7. Clash of clan8. Tinder9. Phone10. linkedin11. Gmail12. Messenger13. Google+14. Amazon15. Headphones16. Music17. Gdrive18. Youtube19. Hangouts20. Twitter21. Line 22. Jaumo23. WattpadPremium Package includes unlimited editing of old notifications and set user icons.We use storage permissions to access and store user icons for notification having user icons.Note: We don't send/store any personal data. The app is completely free from such things. We just show ads and you can get rid of them too by buying premium.

desc_summary: 휴대 전화 및 스마트 워치를 연결
desc: Connect your phone and SmartWatch. Gets a messages and incoming calling notifications from your phone. Works with all china's SmartWatchesRead the instruction in app!

desc_summary: 당신의 잠금 화면에서 노트보기! 안드로이드 알림으로 메모를 표시합니다.
desc: Notification Notes is a simple note taking app that lets you display your notes as native Android notifications. The notes are displayed as persistent low priority notifications.Features:- Save your notes to note list- Show/hide note's notification with a switch in note list- Edit notes by touching them in the notes list- Remove note by long pressing it in the note list- Open the note list by touching a notification- Existing notifications are restored after restartNotification Notes is open source. See https://github.com/khuttun/NotificationNotes

desc_summary: 알림 패널의 메모 및 알림.
desc: Quick Reminders is a simple, light-weight application that allows you to add Notes/Reminders to a persistent notification in your system pull-down shade.Key features:* Create a pinned note in your notification shade/pull-down.* Post now or at a set time & date.* Repeat reminders every Minute, Hour, Day, Week or Month* Manage your active reminders.* Add an always visible title with collapsible contents* All Quick Reminders are persistent across reboot & wont be lost.* Choose a high or low priority notification, this will affect how much the notification can be collapsed & weather or not the icon shows in the status-bar.* Randomise the notification highlight colour or choose a custom highlight colour.* Choose weather to apply the highlight colour to the contents text.* Dismiss, edit or create a new note directly from your existing Quick Reminder notifications.* Share the note/reminder with any other application.* Send text from any other application to Quick Reminders.* Expand and collapse your Quick Reminders so they take up less space.* Optionally group multiple notifications to avoid clutter in the status bar.* Accessible from the Quick Settings Pull-down (Android 7 and above).Supported Languages:* English* German* Spanish* Portuguese* Polish* ThaiFeel free to contact me via the feedback option in the about dialog, all feature requests will be considered :)This is a standalone & enhanced version of Quick Reminder included in my other application, Shortcutter Quick Settings:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.leedroid.shortcutterQuick Reminders does not store or share any information or data in the background.KeyWords: note, notes, reminder, reminders, notification, post-it, list, alarm, memo, To-Do, memory

desc: Do you have secret messages that you do not want to be seen by someone else?Do you wish not popup new notification at some times?If the answer is yes, then Notification Guard is the best notification app for you. Notification Guard is a great notification hider and message blockerwhich can protect your new messages like Whatsapp messages, Facebook messages, text messages etc. It provides various functions such as Notification mask (hide notification), Do not disturbnotification (block new messages with one key), Message box (hidden message management), Cleanup notification bar.Function highlightsSmall and powerful- Notification Guard's installation package is very small and provides the most powerful function of its kind;Simple and friendly - The usage of Notification Guard is simple, interactive and its interface design is very friendly, and very easy to use;Convenient and quick - It provides a notice bar shortcut tool, one click can meet your needs.Mask App Notifications?mask your privatemessageSet different mask patterns for your app to avoid secret messages (such as Whatsapp messages, Facebook messages, text messages) from being seen by others.Normal maskHidethe notification title and content of the app, showing only the app's icon and number of notifications. When the app is set to normal mask, will hide notification content of the app, but will still show the hidden messagessent by the app. Normal mask is suggested to mask private messages of common socialapps, such as Whatsappmessages, Facebook messages, text messages, etc.Mask as text messagesHide the notification content and icon of the app, and mask the notification sent by the app as a text message. When the app is set to Mask messages, the notification sent by the app will be completely masked as receiving a new text message, and the icon app and notification content are completely hidden. It is recommended to mask higher privacy app to prevent the disclosure of the secret messages.Mask as Facebook massagesSimilar to Maskas text messages, Mask as Facebook massages will hide the notification contents and icon of the app, and mask the notifications sent by the app as Facebook messages. When the app is set to Mask Facebook massages, the notification sent by the app will be completely masked as receiving a Facebook message, and the app icon and notification content are completely hidden. It is recommended to mask higher privacy app to prevent the disclosure of the secret messages.	Mask keywords?hide notifications including keywordsWhen set some keywords, such as lover’s name or nickname of someone, to mask keywords, the notifications including keywords will hide content and only show app icon and notification numbers.	Do not disturbnotification-block notification with one keyIs it very embarrassing whennewnotifications popupat important times? Is it annoying when new notifications popup at break time? Notification Guardis a good notification and message blocker for you. Use the Do not disturbnotification to open the Do not disturb mode with one key, block messages and notificationsof all apps, and will not pushnew notifications.	Message box? hidden message managementWhen the Do not disturb mode is turned on, the blocked message will be stored in the Message box, and you can open the Message box to view the hidden messages. Click hidden messageand you can access the app directly. Also you can cleanup the hidden messages with one key.	Persistent notification bar - shortcut toolbarPull down the system notification bar, you can open or close the Do not disturb mode with one key, which is faster and more efficient. And the shortcut toolbar displays the number of messages stored in the Message box in real time, which allows you to quickly access the Message box to view the hidden messages. When there are too many notifications at the notification bar, just click the clean button on the toolbar to cleanup the system notification bar.

desc: Never forget anything again! Just notify yourself with a reminder!Sometimes you don’t want to use an alarm because it disturbs the people around you.But you need to remind yourself in a few hours / days to do something. PushMe lets you write notes, and sends them to you as a notification or message at a specific time or right now.Super quick and simple.Just 3 steps! (or 1 step)1. Set title and message (both optional)2. Set a time and date (both optional - if you don’t set a time you get your notification right now)3. Hit the save buttonAdditional Features:? Set default settings for vibration and sound? Open your keyboard automatically on app launch? Cancel Notifications before they appear? Choose your own notify ringtone? Choose your notification LED color? Remind yourself again in 5min via notification button below your message(or get the premium version to unlock more repetition settings)Premium Features:? No ads? Set a different repeat time for the notification button (default is 5 min)  (available times: 5min, 10min, 15min, 30min, 1h, 2h, 3h, 6h, 12h, 24h, 48h)Very easy and fast. Wether it is a memo, checklist, to-do, message or just a quick note. You can remind yourself with a notification instead of using a loud and disturbing alarm or calendar event. You can write down your grocery list or a quick message to not forget what to buy. Set up simple reminders for online auctions or tasks, appointments and upcoming events like a barbershop or doctors appointment. Get reminded to send a text for your friends birthday or message your coworker for a lunch date. Many successful people write down lists, notes or messages to stay organised and to never forget important tasks or events. Simple and effective reminder with PushMe.New: Write lists of all sorts with multiline support for the message field. Notify yourself with a quick reminder by writing your grocery list and shopping notes and receive it when you are at the grocery store. If you are still in the car simply repeat the note with the re-schedule button to get the same notification again in a few minutes. PushMe is the simplest way to notify yourself with a reminder to not forget anything again.New: Change the notify LED color to recognise PushMe reminders extra quick.Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Vietnamese, GreekFAQ:Q: I bought Premium but I still see ads. Why?A: Open PushMe and tap on the settings icon on the top right. Try to change the repeat time. If you can change the time, then you have Premium.Close PushMe and swipe it away from recent apps. Then open PushMe again.If you still see ads please contact me (Email below).Q: I don't get notifications in the status bar after I set them up. Why?A: If you don't receive your notes or reminders as notifications, try to go to your system settings and give Push Me "priority display" permission. Not all phones have this setting. You should now be able to receive your messages.Still not working? Send me an E-Mail (see below).Q: Does this kill my battery?A: No. The android OS will tell Push Me when it is time to do its work, meaning when to send the notification. So Push Me doesn't have to run in the background when your phone is not being used.Suggestions or Bugs, or you want to help translate PushMe? Send me an E-Mail: snadeveloper@gmail.com

desc: Volume in Notification is intended for use on devices running Android 4.1 and up.This app puts a media volume and mute control in the Notifications window that can be accessed from the status bar on your device.  It lets you adjust the volume without using the hardware volume button and without exiting the app that you're currently running.  For example, you can adjust the volume of a video directly from the Notifications window while continuing to watch the video.We developed this app because we often find it hard to use the hardware volume button on a tablet, depending on its orientation and how we have it set up in the stand.  We hope you find it useful too!Note: This app will only control media volume.  In general, media volume includes music, video, and game sounds.To use: Tap on the app icon and select Activate. This will put the volume control into the Notifications window. On the status bar, pull down the Notifications window to access the volume control.To close: Tap on the app icon and select Deactivate.Important:? This app does NOT have any ads.  If you are seeing ads in your Notifications window, then they are being put there by a different app.? Make sure that a task killer or other phone/battery/memory manager app isn't killing Volume in Notification or preventing it from running at startup.? If the volume control does not display in the Notifications window, make sure that notifications are turned on for your device under Settings > Apps > Volume in Notification > Show notifications (check the box).  Note: This setting is available for Android 4.1 and up only.? To hide the volume control on your lock screen, you must:1) In Volume in Notification, check "Hide on lock screen"2) On your device, set a screen lock such as a PIN or password3) (For Android 5.X to 6.X only) On your device, hide sensitive content under Settings > Sound & notification > When device is locked > Hide sensitive notification content? To hide the status bar icon:In Volume in Notification, set the Priority level to "Min", the Importance level to "Low" (Android 8.X), or the Behavior to "Show silently and minimize" (Android 9.0+)? Tapping the Mute button will allow you to mute and unmute the volume.? We use the standard Android AudioManager API, which only allows the volume increments you see in this app.? It's not possible to put a sliding volume bar in the Notifications window.

It allows you to show important notifications and ignore annoying unnecessary notifications. Blocked messages will be hidden together in one place for later check. In this way, you can keep phone notification bar in a cleaner and tidy status.How to use?Step 1: Install Notification Manager and its mother program All-In-One Toolbox(Cleaner) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=imoblife.toolbox.full, find it from All-In-One Toolbox- Toolbox- PluginsStep 2: Grant “Notification Access” to Notification ManagerStep 3: Go to app Settings and enable Notification ManagerStep 4: Pick apps you want to hide notifications, and it is done!How to find blocked messages Blocked messages are put together in Notification Manager; click Notification Manager on notification bar, you can check all unread notifications there. Drag a message right and you will be able to delete it. desc_summary: 펄스 LED를 사용하면 장치를 더 스마트하고 밝게 충전 할 수 있습니다.
desc: Take control over your device charging notification LED.With Pulse LED you can easily create your own custom LED colour patterns. Activate different LED colours at set battery intervals during charge (requires compatible hardware). Use the pulse on and off settings to control the speed of the pulsating LED. Activate the Low power notification to be notified of when the device battery becomes low.You can also set personal battery level voice announcements; use a swipe gesture or at set battery intervals during charge.Take control of you device. Charge smart, shine bright with Pulse LED. (!) App must be excluded from memory optimiser/cleanersMany newer Android devices will act aggressively to kill background applications and their services. You must ensure Pulse LED is white-listed thus allowed to run on your device at boot time and in the background by excluding it from your memory or battery optimiser/cleaner.(!) Allowing Pulse LED use of the notification LEDSome devices require you to enable the notification LED on either a per-app basis or with a global setting usually found within your device notification/accessibility settings. Pulse LED must have the appropriate setting enabled so it can use LED notifications.(!) Device Limitations & CompatibilityIt is important to understand not all devices will support multi-coloured notification LEDs. Some will only support a few LED colours and unfortunately many Android devices do not have a hardware notification LED. Device vendors will often add to or modify the Android code for their own purpose this may cause incompatibility issues with Pulse LED. If your device is missing a hardware notification LED then Pulse LED will not work for you. Every effort to ensure device compatibility has been made but the possible hardware or vendor issues mentioned are out of my control and may render Pulse LED inoperable on your device. If Pulse LED fails to work as you expect please do contact me for support.Samsung GS3 users disable your LED Indicator in your phone settings before using Pulse LED.Moto some Motorola devices use the wake/active display for notifications and do not give any access to the notification LED.Sony devices you may need to disable STAMINA mode or white-list Pulse LED.LG some users will need to enable 3rd party apps in display settings.Xiaomi devices (MIUI) enable auto-start & notification light in app info and white-list app in power saving mode. Lock Pulse LED from your memory cleaner!HTC devices are usually incompatible due to built in LED indicators.(!) Need Help?You can access support directly from the 'Email' link on this page. Get involved... Have a feature suggestion? Drop me an email and help make Pulse LED even better!Pulse LED does not contain ads or in app purchases!DISCLAIMERPulse LED makes use of your device hardware LED usually situated on the front face of your device. Some devices do not have a hardware notification LED. Please check that your device has one before installing this app. Pulse LED does not control your device camera or flash which is usually situated on the rear of the device. The author offers no responsibility for the use or the correctness of the information provided. It is the users sole responsibility for any liability/claim regarding damage caused from the use or the information provided which may be incorrect or incomplete. Parts of the information or app functionality provided might be extended, adjusted partly or completely removed without separate announcement.

desc_summary: 플래시 알림 for All App
desc: ★★ 플래시 알림 2 출시. 업그레이드 하세요 !! ★★----------- 공지사항 (2019.02.16)----------1) SMS 플래시 사용은 알림앱에 메시지(SMS) 앱을 추가해 주세요2) 구글의 권한 정책에 따라 다음기능이 제거 되었습니다.  - SMS 플래시  - 부재중통화  - 미확인 SMS----------- 공지사항 끝. ----------# 플래시 알림 - ([접근성] 서비스를 활성화 해야함) - 선택한 앱(카카오톡, 알람/시계, 트위터, 이메일 등)에서 새로운 알림 메세지가 오면 플래시가 깜박임 - 색상 선택이 가능한 화면 깜빡임.  - 각각의 앱에 대해서 상세 설정 가능. (시간/횟수/색상) - 안드로이드 4.3 이상 : [알림] 서비스 사용 (TTS 문제가 없음. 더 정확히 동작함) - 안드로이드 4.2 이하 : [접근성] 서비스 사용# 수신 전화 플래시  - 플래시 시작시간/깜빡임 횟수 설정 가능# SMS 플래시# 부재중 통화 / 미확인 SMS / 알림 반복  - 일정 시간 간격으로 확인할 때 까지 반복적으로 플래시가 깜박임# 기타  - 플래시 작동 시간 설정  - 플래시 강제 정지 버튼# 이앱은 [진동후벨 with 플래시 by 흔들어]의 경량화 버전임. 같이 사용하면 충돌날 수 있음.## 참고하세요 ##1) 일부 동작이 안되는 폰이 있을 수 있습니다.2) 동작이 안될경우 핸드폰을 껐다 키면 정상화 됩니다.3) 문의 메일 보낼때 "그냥 안되요" 하면 도와 줄 수가 없습니다.    최소한 핸드폰 기종과 어떻게 안되는지 자세히 보내 주세요.----개발자 연락처 :.

And we give you a heads up, our app works even better because our app supports other messaging apps as well!  Our app sends a popup to notify you, even when you are playing games or watching Youtube in Fullscreen mode. There are many options and various ways you can customize our messaging bubble notifier app. TOP FEATURES OF NBUBBLE ? MESSENGER NOTIFICATION: 	☆ Quick send reply on the message bubble without opening each messaging app.	☆ Notify you when there’s new chats 	☆ Save your time because you don’t have to stop what you’re doing to open the apps. 	☆ All messenger notifications in chat heads. 	☆ View message notification later. 	☆ Customize your message bubbles and themes. 	☆ Access messenger notification screen in lock screen.	☆ Disable nBubble chat heads for specific apps. Lite	☆ Telegram?	☆ Hangouts?	☆ Gmail	☆ Line?	☆ Skype?	☆ Twitter?	☆ Threema?	☆ Textra?	☆ Plus Messenger?	☆ Google Messenger?	☆ Slack?	☆ and nBubble notifications app works for all other messaging appsWe recommend that you try out our app and keep it for at least one day to understand our features better. Customizing our app will also make our app more useful and better for you personally. If you need a feature that isn’t available yet, please mention it on the review and we will try to bring it to you on the next update, usually within a week. IMPORTANT NOTE: 	☆ Please give notifications, popup window, auto start permissions for the app. If you don't know how to enable it, please search in Google?	☆ Redmi mobiles(Redmi Note 3) have some problems, so auto start permission is must, give auto start permission via Security->Auto Start->Turn on for nHead.??Contact nBubble notifications team?We listen to users, please report issues and give suggestions for nBubble notifications.?Email: nhead.notifications@gmail.com??If any one interested to fund or buy our app, please contact us at nhead.notifications@gmail.com.Give your friends a heads up about this amazing app! desc_summary: 알림 표시 등으로 주변 표시
desc: Newer phones like the Moto series lack a notification light. Instead, they have a 'Moto' or 'Ambient' Display that lights up for a few seconds when a notification is received.However, when you are not frequently using the phone and it is standing or lying still, you may easily miss a notification.For phones having an AMOLED display, an always-on solution may be viable. For other devices this consumes a lot of battery.MotoLED will notify you by periodically activating the ambient display, reducing battery consumption, more with larger intervals.Activating starts upon any (not excluded, see below) clearable notification when the screen is off.Activating stops when any (not excluded, see below) clearable notification is removed, when the screen is unlocked, or when the MotoLED main screen is opened.Unlocking will be detected if screen locking was set, but may not be detected otherwise (device dependent). Detection happens shortly after unlocking, so may fail if the device is immediately turned off again.Screen-on caused by call ringing will not stop current activating, but off-hook will (even without unlocking).SETTINGS----------------'Activating' means executing any of the following options:- Ping ambient display (single trigger)- Sound (clicking sound, off/low/medium/high)- Vibrate (500 msec)When triggered, the device itself determines what is displayed and for how long.These actions are executed simultaneously, with the set interval (1-60 sec).'Limit'Activating will stop after the set period (1-24 hours). New notifications will not extend the limit, unlocking or removal of any notification will reset the timer.'Disable at night' and 'Disable during DND' (Do Not Disturb) suppress activation during the set period.New notifications will be detected, but activating starts (or resumes) as soon as the set period has ended.'Exclude in title' With this option left empty, MotoLED is triggered by any notification that has been allowed in the device settings.There may be notifications that you do not want to trigger MotoLED. These can be excluded by entering here a string that occurs in the notification title.Filtering is case-sensitive. Multiple strings (for more notifications) should be separated by ||. A string starting and ending with / is evaluated as regular expression.'Stop on Low Battery'MotoLED uses the system signal on 15% battery level, which does not require constant monitoring.IMPORTANT PERMISSIONS------------------------------------------READ_PHONE_STATE: let MotoLED detect missed calls.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE: let MotoLED detect new notifications.REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATION: keep MotoLED functioning when the screen is off.After opening the app, MotoLED will offer an option to grant these permissions if necessary.Please note that without these permissions, MotoLED will fail to function as desired.PRIVACY STATEMENT----------------------------------MotoLED does not collect data and no data leaves your device in any way.

app: 알림 표시 줄 사용자 정의 - 상태 표시 줄 변경자
desc_summary: 알림 표시 줄 바 꾸미기 / 알림 바 체인저 및 상태 표시 줄 체인저
desc: 알림 바 사용자 정의 / 알림 바 변경자 및 상태 표시 줄 체인저는 뉴스, 캘린더, 모든 Apps 컨트롤 및 알림 바 배경으로 설정된 배경 무늬 또는 GIF 포함을 비롯한 모든 새로운 맞춤 알림 알림 및 상태 바 체인저입니다. 예!! 이제 바탕 화면 또는 사진 또는 GIF를 알림 표시 줄 배경으로 사용할 수 있습니다. 내 사진 알림 표시 줄 또는 알림 표시 줄 사용자 정의 또는 알림 표시 줄 체인저,이 응용 프로그램은 다운로드에 사용할 수있는 종류의 응용 프로그램 중 하나입니다. 내 사진 알림 표시 줄 또는 알림 표시 줄 사용자 정의 또는 알림 표시 줄 변경 도구에서 배경 사진이나 GIF를 설정할 수있을뿐만 아니라 사용자 정의하여 뉴스 헤드 라인 및 모든 Apps 제어 기능을 사용할 수도 있습니다.알림 표시 줄 사용자 지정 또는 내 사진 알림 표시 줄 기능1. 상태 표시 줄 사용자 정의 또는 상태 표시 줄 변환기 : 상태 표시 줄 사용자 정의 또는 상태 표시 줄 변환기를 사용하면 상태 표시 줄에 표시하려는 내용과 상태 표시 줄에서 원하는 색상에 따라 전체 상태 표시 줄을 사용자 정의 할 수 있습니다. 상태 표시 줄 사용자 정의 또는 상태 표시 줄 변경기를 사용하여 다음을 사용자 정의하십시오.          에이. 신호 강도 on / off          비. 배터리 백분율 켜기 / 끄기          기음. 상태 표시 줄의 색상 변경          디. 이동 통신사 이름 변경          이자형. 시간 형식 변경          에프. 상태 표시 줄 텍스트 색상, 크기, 글꼴 변경 2. 내 사진 알림 표시 줄 또는 알림 표시 줄 맞춤 설정 / 알림 바 변경 : - 내 사진 알림 표시 줄 또는 알림 표시 줄 맞춤 설정 / 알림 표시 줄 변경 기능을 사용하면 사랑하는 사람의 사진을 알림 표시 줄 배경에 추가 할 수 없으며, GIF에는 실시간 알림 표시 줄 배경이 있습니다. 갤러리의 사진을 선택하거나 배경 또는 독점적으로 디자인 된 인앱 배경과 GIF를 선택하여 알림 표시 줄 배경으로 설정할 수 있습니다.3. 알림 바 사용자 정의 / 알림 바 체인저 : - 알림 바 체인저 또는 알림 표시 줄 사용자 지정 또는 내 사진 알림 표시 줄을 사용하여 다음을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.          에이. 캘린더 사용 / 사용 중지          비. 알림 테마 변경 설정 GIF 및 사진          기음. WiFi 켜기 / 끄기          디. 모바일 데이터 사용 / 사용 중지          이자형. 블루투스 켜기 / 끄기          에프. 조용한 진동 모드          지. 회전 potrate, 가로          h. 플래시 켜기 / 끄기          나는. 니그 모드 켜기 / 끄기          j. 위치 켜기 / 끄기          케이. 핫스팟 켜기 / 끄기          엘. 온 / 오프를 방해하지 않는다.          엠. 비행기 모드 켜기 / 끄기          엔. screenshot take4. 알림 표시 줄에 뉴스 표시 : - 내 사진 알림 표시 줄 또는 알림 표시 줄 사용자 지정 / 알림 표시 줄 변경 기능을 사용하면 알림 표시 줄에 뉴스 헤드 라인을 표시하여 업데이트 상태를 유지할 수 있습니다. 앱에 들어가서 전체 뉴스 기사를 읽을 수도 있습니다.모든 새로운 알림 표시 줄 사용자 지정 - 상태 표시 줄 변경자 또는 내 사진 알림 표시 줄을 가져오고 전화 알림 표시 줄 및 상태 표시 줄을 사용자 정의하십시오 !!

desc_summary: 바이보이스는 알림, 카카오톡, 라인, 트위터, 페이스북, 전화, 문자, 왓츠앱, 인스타그램 등의 알림을 음성으로 읽어 주는 앱입니다.
desc: 앱 알림, 수신 전화, 문자 메시지, 카카오톡, 라인, 트위터, 페이스북, 왓츠앱, 인스타그램 등 어떤 종류의 앱이라도 상관없이 상단 상태바에 알림을 표시하는 앱이라면 그 알림을 음성으로 읽어 줍니다. - 운전이나 운동 중에 오는 앱 알림, 전화, 문자, 카카오톡, 라인, 페이스북, 트위터,  왓츠앱, 인스타그램 등의 내용을 휴대폰을 보지 않고도 쉽게 알 수 있습니다.- 운전하는 중에 문자 메시지를 확인하기 위해 고개를 돌려 폰을 보는 것과 같은 위험한 행동을 하지않아도 됩니다.- 도서관에서 공부 중에도 이어폰을 끼고 있으면 각 종 알림을 휴대폰을 가방에서 꺼내지 않아도 알 수 있습니다.- 화장실에 있을 때도 방안에 있는 휴대폰에서 울리는 전화가 누구에게 왔는지 알 수 있습니다.- 주방에서 요리 중 일 때도 거실에서 울리는 문자가 어떤 내용인지 알 수 있습니다.- 이제 더 이상 운동 중 땀에 젖은 손으로 휴대폰을 만지지 않아도 친구에게 온 카카오톡이나 라인을 확인할 수 있습니다.바이보이스가 제공하는 풍부한 옵션들을 사용하여 내게 딱 맞는 알림 읽는 시기를 자유 자재로 설정할 수 있습니다.- 다양한 주변 장치(이어폰이나 블루투스 헤드셋과 같은)의 연결 상태에 따라 알림을 읽을지 말지 결정할 수 있습니다.- 여러 개의 블루투스 장치와 연결되어 있다면 우선 순위를 설정하여 어느 장치로 음성을 내 보낼 지 자동으로 선택하도록 할 수 있습니다.- 특정 장소의 와이파이에 연결되었을 경우에만 알림을 읽도록 할 수 있으므로 사무실의 와이파이가 연결되면 알림을 읽지 않도록 설정하고 집의 와이파이가 연결되면 알림을 읽도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 폰의 칼렌더의 특정 일정이 진행 중일 때에는 알림이 울리지 않도록 설정할 수 있으므로 회의 중이나 공부 중일 때는 알림을 읽지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 폰의 화면이 꺼진 상태에서만 알림을 읽도록 하거나 폰을 가로 모드로 게임을 즐길 때에는 알림을 읽지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 네비게이션 앱이 켜질 때에만 알림을 읽도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 유투브나 음악 앱을 사용중일 때에는 알림을 읽지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 현재 사용 중인 앱의 알림을 읽지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 특정 시간대에는 알림을 읽지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 원하지 않은 장소나 시간에 갑자기 알림을 읽는 다면 폰을 뒤집어 알림 읽기를 중지하도록 설정할 수 있습니다. 벨 소리가 울리는 중이라면 벨 소리도 함께 중지할 수 있습니다.- 원하지 않는 단어가 포함된 알림은 읽지 않도록 하거나 다른 단어로 치환하여 읽도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 폰의 성능이 조금 느리다면 알림 읽기를 몇 초 정도 지연 후 읽도록 설정할 수 있으며, 너무 잦은 알림을 발생시키는 앱의 알림은 몇 초의 간격을 두고 알림을 읽도록 설정할 수 있습니다.- 태스커 플러그인을 지원하기 때문에 태스커 앱을 사용하시는 분이라면 좀 더 유연하게 알림 읽는 시기를 설정할 수 있습니다.이제 알림을 확인하기 위해 폰을 만질 필요 없이 음악처럼 그냥 들으세요. 바이보이스가 음성으로 읽어 드립니다.----개발자 연락처 :*주소: 702-719, 789, Guam-dong, Buk-gu, Daegu, Republic of Korea*전화: +821042105808*사업자등록번호: 602-10-50606

desc_summary: 알림 역사 Pro는 모든 수신 알림을 저장 응용 프로그램입니다.
desc: Notification History Pro is the AD FREE version it is is an app that stores all your incoming notifications. There are cases when we might accidentally clear all our notifications without attending to all of them, how do we know which app had sent us notifications ? Thats how Notification Saver comes in, it will store a history of all your notifications for you to review at a later date.Features:+ 24 or 12 hour timezone+ Prioritize notifications with alert+ Notification Grouping+ Notification Sorting+ Delete all+ Delete individual notifications / Group+ And many more to come!Notification Saver also gives you the ability to prioritize specific notifications, for example; if you have a Smart Smoke detector in your home, outside camera with motion detector etc, you can use notification history app to prioritize notifications from that app, so when your phone receives an alert you will hear a loud alarm sound which indicates that your phone just received a notification from your Smoke detector and other apps.We welcome all suggestions... to help develop this app with great features.

Carefully selected collection of modern tones,beep sounds, funny tones, game tones, tones of terror, cute sounds, animal sounds, electronic or original sounds and much more.Try Sounds for WhatsApp totally free, Use the ringtones as notification sounds for your Android phone, such as tone for your chats or your alarm clock, as a ringtone for your ringtones, as sound for messages text or for any notification tone.It is very easy to use, Just single click on particular ringtone to play and set.Main Features:-- Best Collection of Notification sounds- Easy to use UI- High Quality sounds- Set as default Ringtone, Notification, Contact ringtone or Alarm sound - This is a free app to download.- Work Offline, do not need internet connection.Come on, it will make your phone sound better!* Ringtones are updated weekly with high quality and they are absolutely free. *Thank You!

desc: IMPORTANT: Enable Notification Access.The app must be able to read all notifications posted by the system or any installed app.IMPORTANT?	You can not see the notifications you received before installing this application.?	Notification History is not developed to see deleted messages. This app is for the history of all Android notifications.Have you ever missed an important notification shown in your device status bar?No worries! "Notification Summary" can safely store them for you.The app is able to record all notifications posted by the system or any installed app.Features and Benefits?	No root?	Ability to share and copy the notification text?	Blacklist: List of apps to ignore?	Notification preview: Full notification summary?	Quick search by text?	You can delete the notification history at any time?	The application saves the notification history only on your device?	Backup and restore data?	Privacy: No information is public or stored in an online database.No tracking of user activity?	Easy to useDEVICE RESTRICTIONSOn some devices (Xiaomi, Meizu, Oppo, Vivo...) you may need to enable additional permissions or disable certain restrictions.?	Run in background (Settings or Security app): Enabled?	Autostart (Security app): Enabled?	Battery Saver (Settings or Security app): No restrictionsOTHER ISSUESSome apps (Speed Booster, Cache Cleaner, RAM Cleaner, Antivirus, Battery Saver...) may restart running services to free up resources.Whitelist this app if you are using one of these apps.TROUBLESHOOTINGhttps://julietapp.blogspot.com/p/troubleshooting-notification-access.htmlNOTEThis version saves the last 300 notifications received.If you want to know more, please don't hesitate to email us at argondeviant@gmail.comTAGS: Recent Notification, Notification Register, Notification Log, Notification History, Notification History Log, Notification History Saver, Notification Saver, Past Notifications, Missed Notification

desc: Notification manager will let you manage all the notification of your phone caused by lots of apps installed in your phone. You can easily disable unwanted android notifications from your phone more quickly.Notifications are very important in android smartphones where every ￢installed app can send you notifications of any event or so. These notifications can disturb you as well if are useless for you and you have to uninstall that app if you want to clear its notifications. But notification will let you manage all the notifications coming from apps and you can turn them off quickly. Take control of all your notifications and manage them in one easy and most powerful app to remove unwanted android notifications. It will make you quickly manage android notifications (like turn on or off) so no more searching for checkbox to turn them off.How to manage notifications using android notification manager:-	Install the notification manager app and launch it quickly.-	It will show you all the apps with notifications.-	Click on any app and manage its notifications with notification manager app.-	You can block all notification by enabling block radio button.-	You can make any notification show silently on your phone.-	It can be shown on the lock screen with one tap using notification manager.-	You can block it while do not disturb mode with android notifications manager.Features of notification manager:Notification manager has following features:1-	Turn of notifications: notification manager will let you turn of your notifications more easily and quickly.2-	Easy app: notification manager is an easy app let you clear all unwanted notifications more easily and quickly.3-	Block spams: notification manager will block all the spam notifications and make you more comfortable. Whenever you get a spam notification from any app turn it off with one click using notification manager.4-	User friendly app: notification manager app is a user friendly app and can be used with more comfort and ease.5-	Free features: notification manager app will bring you all these features for free without any purchase in feature.6-	Lock screen notifications: It will allow managing lock screen notification with android notifications settings.Notification manager is one place to manage all your notifications without searching for the menu to switch them off. It is the best and most useful notification manager app which is incredible in working.Notification manager is the best android notifications app which manages and disable all the unwanted notifications from your phone like never before. Try notification manager app now and rate us for further improvements and changes if necessary.

app: LED Blinker Notifications Lite -Manage your lights
desc_summary: 페이스 북, 싸이 월드, 미투데이 및 더 많은 LED를 컨트롤, 실제 LED가? 화면이 사용됩니다!
desc: Let LED Blinker Notifications show your missed calls, SMS and Gmail messages. If you have no hardware led, the screen is used.Only some applications are supported by the lite version, see advantages of the full version below!All apps are supported in the full version.It is possible to remove the ADS (see the button at the top or at menu) but you WON'T get the FULL VERSION!This app, which ist created in material design, is very simple to use and not much configuration is needed!For latest news and tips read my blog http://www.mo-blog.deFunctions:? Works with latest Android Kitkat/Lollipop/Marshmallow/Nougat/Oreo/Pie version? individual settings for each app, e. g. blink rate, vibration, sounds and repeats? Last notifications overview? Last messages overview including messages deleted by your contacts (in-app purchase)? Silent mode for every day (enable it for the night to stop blinking)? widget to deactivate LED Blinker/remove notifications quickly? Screen LED for phones without real LEDExamples for apps with notifications:? missed calls and sms ? Battery status? Google Mail ? Google Talk/Google Hangouts? Calendar reminder notifications? Standard EMail App? Bluetooth messages (LED goes on when bluetooth is active)? Alternative On-Screen-LED Advantages full version:Functions:? Contact specfic colors for WhatsApp, missed call, Telegram, Signal? Save battery in pocket mode? light and dark color scheme? export/import settings (no lost settings when you install new ROMS/mods)? Enable the camera flashlight for new notifications (laboratory function - beta)? New smart notifications (filter for specific message text)? Use app symbols or custom pictures for on screen LED? All apps are supported? Facebook messages ? WhatsApp? Skype messages ? Twitter, Threema (now with group support), Facebook Messenger and so on.AndroidHeadLines: 'LED Blinker is an Android app that aims to make it much easier to help you figure out which notification is which'.http://androidheadlines.com/2014/12/sponsored-app-review-led-blinker-notifications.htmlUnlike other apps in this category you don't need 'ROOT' access to use LED Blinker and this app is very battery friendly!All rights are needed to run the app, lesser are not possible.The new right to write to SD card it needed for error reports (check menu extras: Debug mode), please send it to mosoft.android@gmail.com if you have found an error.Facebookhttp://goo.gl/I7CvMGoogle+http://goo.gl/5XBdNPlease try out the lite version at first to see if your hardware LED works (on screen LED is always working!).Please check device specific hints at the end!Fast support is very important for me! (Look at the ratings, thanks to all people!)If you have problems please do a full re-install and/or reboot your phone. Otherwise contact me at Facebook/Google+/Email to get help.Warning: If your phone speaks after install (Samsung S4, SIII, S3 Mini, S2, Note1, Note2, Note3, LG Nexus 4) you have to disable Samsung TTS (text-to-speech) under settings -> apps manager -> all (on the right) and Google TTS (text-to-speech).Only needed when you use the accessiblity service!Another solution to fix talkback issue:You can change the launcher by using another one from the Google Play Store. For example, Solo Launcher - Swift & Smart, Nova Launcher, Go Launcher and Holo Launcher. These launchers will not exhibit this bug.For Samsung S4 users: If your phone speaks when opening your browser you have to use another browser like Chrome or Firefox.Hint HTC users: Your phone is NOT supported, you have to use the on screen led!Sony Phones: Please disable stamina mode in your device settings.Let your led indicator glow with different colors!BETA Test:https://goo.gl/66v6R5https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.ledblinker

desc_summary: 스마트 폰의 가장자리에 멋진 세련된 컬러 조명 파도를 가져옵니다
desc: Are you bored with the old dull looks of android calling screen..? Get this cool S9 Waves Call Notification application for your smart phone and make it look cool. While someone calls you, you will get cool stylish waves on the edge of your smart phone instead of the simple calling screen of android. Meanwhile, the application is downloading take a look at the below given features: Cool Features     Very attractive designs     Cool edge animations     Fully customizable designs and colors     Very small size application     You can easily activate and deactivate the edge animations     Very simple user interface making it very easy to understand all in one go When you open the installed application, you will be redirected to the main screen of the application. Here you can see all the options to customize the waves for your smart phone. The first option is to activate and deactivate the waves on the calling screen. Once you install the application, you can select whether you want the wave notification on the calling screen or not. If you do not want to get the wave notification, you can turn it OFF on the main screen of the application itself. When you activate the wave notification, you will see two waves, one imposed on the other. You can change the color according to your requirements. You can set your favorite color by tapping on the Select Color option for Wave 1. When you tap on the Color Select option of Wave 1, you will see various colors to select from. At the bottom of the screen, you will see the square boxes representing various sets of colors. There are hundreds of colors, from which you can select your favorite color. Similarly select your favorite color that best suits or contrasts the color of Wave 1 that you recently selected. The contrasting combination of colors like red and yellow, or green and indigo will make your phone look cool. This application supports multiple animation style of wave patterns. Here you will get three options of different animation. Selecting the ‘Right’ option will activate the two overlapping waves only on the right hand side of your calling screen. This option will deactivate the wave animation on the left hand side. Similarly you can select ‘Left’ option to activate the wave pattern only on the left hand side of your screen and it will deactivate the animation on the right side. To get the animation on both the sides of the calling screen, click on ‘Both’ option. With this option you will get the attractive animation on both the sides.  This application also features the option to set the opacity. As there are two overlapping waves one on the other, you can select the opacity of the two animated waves separately. This way, you can set out the design as per your requirement to make your phone look better. You can select the level of opacity from minimum value zero (0) to maximum value of two hundred and fifty five (255). On the main screen there are two bars where you can select the opacity of the animated waves to be shown up on the calling screen. This cool and stylish application supports three types of widths for the animated waves. You can select the widths like small, medium and big. When you select the width as small, you will see very thing waves along the edges of your phone. To catch your attraction, you can select Medium width and for even more, you can select ‘Big’ option. By using this application, your phone catch your attention while you are busy in you meeting and your phone is lying down on the table. Moreover it will make your phone look cool and will give you something extra and attractive as compared to the normal calling android screen.  So what are you waiting for..? Download this cool animated S7 Waves Call Notification application and get a very attractive calling screen.

desc_summary: 페 스키 알림을 제거!
desc: ROOT is required for the app to work.Notifications Off is a useful utility for controlling application notifications in a centralized way. Instead of toggling notifications for applications individually from the settings screen you can turn off notifications for all applications from one place.Using the new 'Profiles' feature you can keep multiple pre-configured profiles and quickly switch between them with a single click on a shortcut on your home screen. Or, you can completely automate it with Tasker integration.Notifications Off can also automatically disable notifications for new applications as soon as they are installed.Please do not leave one star reviews if it does not work for you. Instead email your device details (model, superuser app and version) to android@aboutmycode.com so that I can help you.Please submit all feedback to android@aboutmycode.com

app: 카카오톡, 라인, 페이스북 메신저, 인스타그램, 왓츠앱 알림 기록 앱 - Timeline
desc_summary: 카카오톡, 라인, 페이스북 메신저, 인스타그램, 왓츠앱 등 모든 앱의 알림을 기록하고 그 역사를 확인합니다.
desc: 주의!이 앱은 알림을 저장하고 그것을 나중에 확인할 수 있도록 도와주는 앱입니다. 이 앱이 저장하지 않은 Whatsapp이나 Facebook messenger등의 앱의 삭제된 메시지는 절대 확인할 수 없습니다.------------------------------------------타임라인 앱을 사용하면 원할 때 언제든지 모든 앱의 알림의 역사를 확인할 수 있습니다.어떤 앱이 어떤 알림을 언제 발생시켰는지 알수 있기 때문에 나의 과거 활동을 아주 쉽게 알 수 있게 해 줍니다.특징- 카카오톡의 알림을 기록하기 때문에 카카오톡 앱을 직접 열어 확인하지 않아도 누구에게 어떤 카톡이 왔는지 쉽게 알 수 있습니다. - 라인, 페이스북 메신저, 인스타그램, 왓츠앱 등 본인이 즐겨 사용하는 모든 종류의 앱에서 보내는 알림을 기록하고 관리합니다.- 알림에 포함된 텍스트와 사진을 함께 저장할 수 있습니다.- 저장된 알림은 원하는 때에 CSV 포멧으로 백업해 둘 수 있으며 백업된 파일은 엑셀이나 텍스트 뷰어를 통해 확인해 볼 수 있습니다.- 알림 내용을 자동으로 분석하여 태그를 달아 주기 때문에 쉽게 검색할 수 있습니다.- 특정 단어나 특정 날짜를 기준으로 검색해 볼 수 있습니다.- 라이브 알림 기능을 사용하면 그 알림이 지정하는 특정 상황으로 바로 이동할 수 있습니다.기능- 특정 앱에서 보낸 알림은 기록에서 제외할 수 있습니다.- 메인 화면의 앱 이름을 길게 터치하면 해당 앱을 바로 기록에서 제외할 수 있습니다.- 앱 이름이나 키워드, 날짜 별로 알림을 검색하고 그 검색 결과만 삭제할 수도 있습니다.- 블랙리스트를 작성하여 그 블랙리스트에 해당 단어가 포함된 알림은 기록에서 제외 할 수 있습니다.- 상세 알림 화면에서 알림을 길게 터치하면 해당 알림의 내용으로 바로 블랙리스트를 작성할 수 있습니다.----개발자 연락처 :*주소: 702-719, 789, Guam-dong, Buk-gu, Daegu, Republic of Korea*전화: +821042105808*사업자등록번호: 602-10-50606

desc_summary: ?? 장치를 다르게 만들기위한 무료 벨소리, 알림 및 알람
desc: 무료 벨소리, 알림 및 알람을 사용하여 장치를 다르게 설정이러한 대용량 사운드는 알림, 벨소리 또는 알람에 이상적입니다. 소리가 크고 깨끗한 100 가지 이상의 소리가 있습니다.이 쉽고 무료 응용 프로그램을 사용하면 휴대 전화 또는 태블릿을 매우 개인적으로 만들 수 있습니다. 새로운 개인 무료 알림 소리로 누가 방금 텍스트 또는 이메일을 수신했는지 궁금하지 마십시오.크고 선명한 사운드를 미리 듣기 만하면됩니다. 원하는 경우 녹색 확인을 누르고 알림, 벨소리, 알람 또는 연락처를 선택하십시오.이 응용 프로그램은 대부분의 장치와 호환되며 알림 또는 벨소리 또는 알람에 사용할 수 있습니다.지금 다운로드하고 각 연락처마다 소리를 낼 수 있으므로 보지 않고 누가 전화하고 있는지 알 수 있습니다!이 애플리케이션의 장점은 무료입니다!우리의 많은 사용자에 따르면 최고의 사운드는 다음과 같습니다.뒤흔들다폭탄어느 한 쪽원자 램프병휴대 전화 나 태블릿과 함께 제공되는 소리와 벨소리를 사용해야하는 이유는 무엇입니까? 당신의 장치를 나머지 부분과 돋보이게하십시오!
